labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Nothing will show but the part of the screen where they should show up freezes in place.
data.expected_result: Pop-ups with the messages you received should be shown
data.short_description: When using Windows 7 Basic or older versions of windows instead of the notifications popping off normally, the screen just get's fixed in place.
data.steps_to_repro: - Download the desktop app of Discord - Change your windows theme to Windows 7 Basic/Windows Classic - Ask someone to send you a message, make sure to have desktop notifications enabled
